text: Vikhroli (Marathi pronunciation: [ʋikʰɾoɭiː]) is a suburb of Mumbai located on the northeastern side of the city. The suburb has a railway station by the name Vikhroli on the Central Railway line. It is also home to one of the largest mangrove forests in Maharashtra, India. ==See also== *Vikhroli railway station ==References== Category:Suburbs of Mumbai
title: Vikhroli
